titleStmt.title: Truth will out, or, A discovery of some untruths smoothly, told by Dr. Ieremy Taylor in his Disswasive from popery with an answer to such arguments as deserve answer / by his friendly adversary E. Worsley.
titleStmt.author: E. W. (Edward Worsley), 1605-1676.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Page 115 misnumbered 215; omission of page numbers 131-136 explained in "Advertisement" on p. [5] at end.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library
